se.jguru.nazgul.test.persistence

Class StandardPersistenceTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.test.persistence.AbstractJpaTest
      • se.jguru.nazgul.test.persistence.AbstractDbUnitAndJpaTest
        • se.jguru.nazgul.test.persistence.StandardPersistenceTest

  • public abstract class StandardPersistenceTest
extends AbstractDbUnitAndJpaTest
    Concrete implementation of the AbstractDbUnitAndJpaTest specification, providing default behaviour and some utility methods to simplify automated (integration-)test creation using an in-memory HSQL database.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_DB_NAME
      The name of the standard/default (in-memory) database.

      The default password within the in-memory unit test database.

      The default userId within the in-memory unit test database.

      Fallback/default PersistenceProviderType, unless defined by the system property JPA_PROVIDER_CLASS_SYSPROPKEY.
      static String DEFAULT_PERSISTENCE_UNIT
      The name of the standard persistence unit.
      static String JPA_PROVIDER_CLASS_SYSPROPKEY
      The system property where the JPA Provider Class is assumed to be bound.

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public final void setUp()
                 throws Exception
        Setting up the DbUnit framework which setup the inherited Persistence Entity Manager. DbUnit will use the already initiated SQL connection from the Persistence Entity Manager.
        Overrides:
        setUp in class AbstractDbUnitAndJpaTest
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurred.

      • doCustomSetup

        protected void doCustomSetup()
        Override this method to perform any custom setup.

      • getDatabaseType

        protected DatabaseType getDatabaseType()
        Retrieves the DatabaseType used by this AbstractJpaPersistenceDbUnitTest.
        Specified by:
        getDatabaseType in class AbstractDbUnitAndJpaTest
        Returns:
        The DatabaseType used by this AbstractJpaPersistenceDbUnitTest. StandardPersistenceTest uses an in-memory HSQL database. Override in specific implementations/test cases to change the DatabaseType.
        See Also:
        DatabaseType.HSQL

      • getPersistenceXmlFile

        protected String getPersistenceXmlFile()
        Defines the value "testdata/" + getClass().getSimpleName() + "/persistence.xml", implying that each concrete test class should define its own persistence.xml file for test-scope usage. This defines a standard behaviour for JPA- and dbUnit-based tests. Override in concrete test classes to use another persistence.xml file.
        Specified by:
        getPersistenceXmlFile in class AbstractJpaTest
        Returns:
        the value "testdata/" + getClass().getSimpleName() + "/persistence.xml".

      • getPersistenceUnitName

        protected String getPersistenceUnitName()
        Retrieves the standard PersistenceUnit name, DEFAULT_PERSISTENCE_UNIT. Override in concrete subclasses to use another persistenceUnit.
        Specified by:
        getPersistenceUnitName in class AbstractJpaTest
        Returns:
        the standard PersistenceUnit name, DEFAULT_PERSISTENCE_UNIT.

      • getEntityManagerFactoryProperties

        protected SortedMap<String,String> getEntityManagerFactoryProperties()
        Override to supply any additional EntityManagerFactory properties. The properties are supplied as the latter argument to the Persistence.createEntityManagerFactory method. The properties supplied within this Map override property definitions given in the persistence.xml file.
        Overrides:
        getEntityManagerFactoryProperties in class AbstractJpaTest
        Returns:
        Properties supplied to the EntityManagerFactory, implying they do not need to be declared within the persistence.xml file.
        See Also:
        Persistence.createEntityManagerFactory(String, java.util.Map)

      • cleanupTestSchema

        protected void cleanupTestSchema(boolean shutdownDatabase)
        Invoked during setup to prepare the schema used for test.
        Specified by:
        cleanupTestSchema in class AbstractJpaTest
        Parameters:
        shutdownDatabase - if true, the database should be shutdown after cleaning the schema.

      • getDatabaseName

        protected String getDatabaseName()
        Retrieves the name of the database used for this AbstractDbUnitAndJpaTest.
        Specified by:
        getDatabaseName in class AbstractDbUnitAndJpaTest
        Returns:

      • setupDatabaseState

        protected final void setupDatabaseState(String testMethodName)
        Standardized version of the setupDatabaseState method, using DatabaseOperation#CLEAN_INSERT for operation and synthesizing the setupDataSetLocation from the testMethodName given.
        Parameters:
        testMethodName - The name of the active test method, such as validateFoo.
        See Also:
        setupDatabaseState(boolean, String)

      • setupDatabaseState

        protected final void setupDatabaseState(boolean cleanBeforeInsert,
                                        String setupDataSetLocation)
        Sets up state within the database using the data provided.
        Parameters:
        cleanBeforeInsert - if true, performs a DatabaseOperation#CLEAN_INSERT and otherwise performs a DatabaseOperation#INSERT.
        setupDataSetLocation - The resource path to the FlatXMLDataSet used to setup database data.

      • getExpectedDatabaseState

        protected final org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet getExpectedDatabaseState(String testMethodName)
        Retrieves an IDataSet holding expected Database state for the supplied testMethodName.
        Parameters:
        testMethodName - The name of the active test method, such as validateFoo.
        Returns:
        An IDataSet holding the DataSet with expected data.

      • performStandardTestDbSetup

        protected final org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet performStandardTestDbSetup(String testMethodName)
        Convenience method performing standardized setup of the in-memory database and retrieving the IDataSet pointing to the expected state following the test. Also begins the transaction, by calling the transaction.begin() method.
        Parameters:
        testMethodName - The name of the testMethod, such as validateCreatePersonEntity.
        Returns:
        the IDataSet pointing to the expected state following the test.

      • performStandardTestDbSetup

        protected final org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet performStandardTestDbSetup()
        Convenience method performing standardized setup of the in-memory database and retrieving the IDataSet pointing to the expected state following the test. Also begins the transaction, by calling the transaction.begin() method. Uses the getTestMethodName() method to retrieve the name of the currently active test method.
        Returns:
        the IDataSet pointing to the expected state following the test.
